#summary Information about Zinwell
#labels company

= Introduction =
*Zinwell* is a [Taiwan Taiwanese] electronics company.

It is one of the main suppliers of hardware for [NewZealand New Zealand]'s digital television network [Freeview]. They also have business in [Brazil].

Set-top boxes that they make that use .zim files include:
  * [ZMT-620HD Zinwell ZMT-620] - a common NZ set-top box, also rebranded as [DickSmithElectronics DSE].
  * [ZMT-640PVR Zinwell ZMT-640] - contains two tuners and a hard-drive
  * [ZBT-620] - a Brazilian ISDB set-top box
